instruction.translation[0].definitions[0: a statement telling someone what they must do
My instructions are (=I have been told) to give the package to him personally.
Make sure you carry out the doctor’s instructions.
He had specific instructions to check everyone’s identity cards.
Mrs Edwards gave instructions that she was not to be disturbed.
On the landlord’s instructions, the barmaid refused to serve him.
The police were under instruction to fire if necessary.
be under instruction to do something
instruction.translation[0].definitions[1: teaching that you are given in a particular skill or subject
The school gives instruction in first aid.
This group of trainees is still under instruction.
instruction.translation[0].note_box[0].s: follow the instructions
You should follow the instructions on the packet.
read the instructions
Always read the instructions before switching on the machine.
provide/supply instructions
Detailed instructions are supplied with the software.
come with instructions
The tent comes with instructions on how to put it up.
the instructions say/tell you to do something
The instructions say that you should take the tablets after meals.
ADJECTIVES/NOUN + instructions

detailed

written instructions

full/comprehensive instructions

step-by-step instructions

safety instructions

operating instructions

cooking instructions
